imdb.plot outline: Playing Through with John Weisbarth is a new kind of golf show. It begins at a local driving range with a simple question for an unsuspecting mark, "Do you want to golf with me"? Once we get a yes, that golfer is whisked away for an all expense paid round at that week's designated course... but that is just the beginning. During the round we offer our "Lucky Golfer" a chance to win various prizes by completing interesting, and sometimes outrageous challenges on the golf course. It's light-hearted, entertaining fun that golfers, and non-golfers alike, will be talking about all week long.
imdb.title: Playing Through with John Weisbarth
akas: Playing Through with John Weisbarth (United States)
